Detailed Description

Software representation of the system screen.

Implemented as a custom Surface. There should be only one screen per application.

See also:
Surface

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Screen::Screen (  )

Create the screen surface.

This constructor also uses parameters defined in 'config.ini' accessed by the CONFIG macro.

See also:
Config.h

Member Function Documentation

void Screen::Draw (  ) [inline, virtual]

Hides Surface::Draw().

Reimplemented from Surface.

void Screen::operator= ( Surface &  s )

Assignment operator.

Use this operator to plot a surface to the screen. This should be the last step when displaying an animation frame. Usually called from the Video class.

Parameters:
sSurface to be displayed on screen.
See also:
Video.h Surface.h
